message.connectiblechains.connectible_ch: Click on fences/walls to create a catenary!
connectiblechains.configuration.chainHan: Effects how much the chain hangs.
Lower numbers equals more a bigger curve.
Collision will update on new chains or world loading.
connectiblechains.configuration.showTool: Show tooltip over chain items that are compatible with this mod.
connectiblechains.configuration.maxChain: Effects how long a chain can be.
§nWarning§r: Long chains can sometimes become invisible!
Effects the visual quality the chain.
connectiblechains.title: Connectible Chains Configs
